parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be directly from an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Forța Dreptei" (FD), a parliamentary candidate party.  This directly refers to a candidate participating in the election, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The use of Facebook as a platform and the paid nature of the post strongly suggest it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support "Forța Dreptei" in the upcoming elections. Phrases like "Duminică votăm Forța Dreptei! Duminică votăm bine!" clearly aim to influence voting behavior, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a clear call to action, promoting a specific party, rather than providing neutral information or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement of a political party, aiming to sway public opinion towards a specific electoral outcome.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1622251322038541</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes the "Forța Dreptei" party, urging voters to support them.  The paid nature of the advertisement, its targeting, and the explicit call to vote for a specific party strongly indicate it's electoral propaganda. The post's timing is crucial; even if the exact date isn't specified, the phrase "Duminică votăm" (We vote on Sunday) strongly suggests it's intended for election day or the days immediately preceding it.  The post fulfills all criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, defining electoral propaganda.  The absence of a CMF number raises concerns about transparency, but doesn't negate the propagandistic nature of the content.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Forța Dreptei</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul Național Țărănesc Maniu Mihalache, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1622251322038541), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează explicit Partidul Forța Dreptei, îndemnând cetățenii să voteze pentru acesta cu fraze precum „Duminică votăm Forța Dreptei! Duminică votăm bine!”, având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea partidului menționat.  Reclama, cu o cheltuială de sub 100 RON, a atins o estimare de 10.000-15.000 de impresii și o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt diaspora@pntmm.ro și +40770958865.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 98 t).
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
